channel.title: Simplicity is a form of art... - wacom

item.title: Today was a productive day
item.description: Fixed 14 bugs today, with a few more pending (those for packages only get marked as FIXED if it is moved to the stable state). One of the changes is the GRUB2 support in the Gentoo Handbook (yes, finally, sorry about that). That opens up the road for the stabilization â€¦
item.dc:creator: Sven Vermeulen
